RelatedSentence: An American Airlines flight heading from Boston to Miami was forced to return to Logan Airport Sunday morning because of smoke caused by burning bread crumbs .
An American Airlines flight heading from Boston to Miami was forced to return to Logan Airport Sunday morning because of smoke caused by burning bread crumbs .
Flight 1532 took off at 6:36 a.m. and was back on the ground at 7:10 a.m. , said Dori Alvarez , spokeswoman for American Airlines .

RelatedSentence: Maintenance crews determined the smell came from inside one of the plane 's ovens , Alvarez said .
Maintenance crews determined the smell came from inside one of the plane 's ovens , Alvarez said .
The 150 passengers and five flight crew members were back in the air at 8:29 a.m. , Alvarez said .
